TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit LocalEndpointPresenceServices extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the base class which provide presence services related to publication of local presence data and subscription to remote presentities.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginPresenceQuery (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> targets, string[] categories, EventHandler<Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.RemotePresentitiesNotificationEventArgs> queryResultHandler, AsyncCallback userCallback, object state);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginPresenceQuery(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> targets, string[] categories, class System.EventHandler`1<class Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.RemotePresentitiesNotificationEventArgs> queryResultHandler, class System.AsyncCallback userCallback, object state) cil managed

Public Function BeginPresenceQuery (targets As IEnumerable(Of String), categories As String(), queryResultHandler As EventHandler(Of RemotePresentitiesNotificationEventArgs), userCallback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult

public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginPresenceQuery(System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::String ^> ^ targets, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ categories, EventHandler<Microsoft::Rtc::Collaboration::Presence::RemotePresentitiesNotificationEventArgs ^> ^ queryResultHandler, AsyncCallback ^ userCallback, System::Object ^ state);

Docs.param: The list of target addresses for the query.
The list of presence categories for the query. Categories that can be set are "contactCard", "note", "state", "services", and "calendarData".
EventHandler to be invoked as results become available. This value can be null.
The method to be called when the asynchronous operation is completed. This value can be null.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other asynchronous operations.
Docs.summary: Begins a presence query request for a given list of targets for the given set of presence categories.
Docs.returns: An IAsyncResult that references the asynchronous operation.

remarks.para: A presence query internally can involve multiple query requests to different single and pool targets. If the user specified a query result handler, then results will be notified on the given event handler as soon as they are available. Calling EndPresenceQuery will return all results for the query.

Docs.exception: Thrown when is an empty collection, or when it contains a null member, or when there are no new targets to be added or removed.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginRefreshRemotePresenceViews (AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginRefreshRemotePresenceViews(class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginRefreshRemotePresenceViews (callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginRefreshRemotePresenceViews(AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

Docs.param: Callback to be invoked when this operation completes.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other asynchronous operations.
Docs.summary: Begins the asynchronous operation to refresh all views that were created out of this endpoint.
Docs.returns: An IAsyncResult that references the asynchronous operation.

remarks.para: This is an expensive operation and applications are advised to use the API sparingly.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.RemotePresentityNotification> EndPresenceQuery (IAsyncResult result);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.RemotePresentityNotification> EndPresenceQuery(class System.IAsyncResult result) cil managed

public: System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<Microsoft::Rtc::Collaboration::Presence::RemotePresentityNotification ^> ^ EndPresenceQuery(IAsyncResult ^ result);

Docs.param: The reference to the pending asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Ends the asynchronous operation initiated by the BeginPresenceQuery.
Docs.returns: The list of presence notifications for the targets.
Docs.exception: Thrown when was created by a Begin method for a different operation.
Thrown when EndPresenceQuery was called more than once for the same instance of result.
Thrown when the SIP SERVICE request is rejected by the server.
Thrown when SIP Transport, SIP authentication and credential-related errors are encountered.
